name: nocobase
description: NocoBase is an open-source no-code platform to build custom apps and workflows using an extensible GUI. It features dynamic schemas, plugins, and API support and can be self-hosted or used as cloud.
features: No-code app builder: Create custom applications using visual interface without programming knowledge.
Dynamic schemas: Design database structures with flexible field types and relationships.
Workflow automation: Build automated processes with triggers, actions, and conditional logic.
Plugin system: Extend functionality with community or custom plugins for specialized features.
Role-based access: Control data and feature access with granular permission management.
API generation: Automatically generate REST APIs for all data models and collections.
Form builder: Create custom forms for data entry with validation and conditional fields.
Data visualization: Build dashboards with charts, tables, and custom views of your data.
Multi-user collaboration: Work with teams on application development and data management.
Import/export: Migrate data between environments or backup collections in standard formats.
Custom blocks: Design reusable UI components for consistent application interfaces.
Self-hosted or cloud: Deploy on your infrastructure or use managed cloud hosting.
